node.widget: sklera is an easy to use and modern digital signage software solution allowing professional playouts on your displays. With the help of sklera your PC, TV or LFD screen becomes a digital signage device within minutes.
You will love the way you can manage your content and displays by our cloud driven software solution. From anywhere and any device.

With sklera your project gets transfered on any screen. Choose between our supported professional signage displays from LG, Samsung or NEC and use sklera using the integrated HTML5 media player. Or you can select a cheap Chrome OS based device like Chromebox or Chromebit to use sklera on your existing displays. Continue to get more information about the available hardware options.

Our Android™ App is freely available on Google Play™! We now support even a broader range of hardware players including the cheap MK808b or MK809 IV based devices or tablets. Upon request we also offer introduced a broadcast license for players.
